description: HTML source file for a database visualization web application, including CSS styles and client-side JavaScript for dynamic data loading and UI interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entries in the sidebar and loads tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data from a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Builds HTML table to display data records.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content on click.
